details:
usb: dwc3: core: fix kernel panic when do reboot

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.12.13 by commit fa8c413e6b74ae5d12daf911c73238c5bdacd8e6, it was introduced in version v5.12.13 by commit afd8b0d091d5b4febe2d0ac3b7735c1826329302. For more details please see the references link.
